feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.73
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for chunked upload security
  • Updated blacklist domains by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10931
  • Enhance payment status handling to include confirmed payments by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10934
  • Improve error message for missing Blockonomics callback URL by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10935
  • v5.11.73 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10950

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.72...v5.11.73

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.74
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for batch DB
  • Updated translations
  • Fixes for Storing Transactions
  • Handle bulk updates on recurring invoices
  • Improve rate limiting
  • Updated lock file
  • Return early if webhook payload is not appropriate by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10951
  • v5.11.74 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.73...v5.11.74

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.75
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable elastic queues by default
  • v5.11.75 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10971

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.74...v5.11.75
